properties.name: Motivated
properties.description: When I work at a project I keep at it until it's done with my personal projects I'm busy until the late hours of the night to finish a feature which i thought out.

properties.name: Teamplayer
properties.description: I love working in teams using the Agile and Scrum methods especially the scrum master role to make sure all the tasks at hand are correctly executed.

properties.name: Creative
properties.description: Thinking outside of the box to solve problems and coming up with new ideas, that is what I love to do with my projects.

preferences.name: Full-stack

preferences.name: Frontend
preferences.description: I love to work on the frontend of a project, I love to design websites and make them look good and enjoyable to use for the users.

preferences.name: Reusability
preferences.description: I love to make my code reusable, I love to make components that can be used in multiple projects, this makes my code more efficient, expandable and easier to maintain.
